SEARCH
Package com.example.donotredeem

Class MainPageAdapterTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.donotredeem.MainPageFragmentAdapterTest
public class MainPageAdapterTest extends Object
Unit tests for the MainPageAdapter class focusing on core adapter functionality while avoiding Android framework dependencies. Verifies proper data handling and basic adapter operations through method overrides and mock objects.

Key test areas include:

  • Adapter initialization with mock context and test data
  • Data retrieval methods (getItem, getItemId)
  • Item count management
  • Simplified view handling verification

Uses Mockito to mock Android Context and creates a custom adapter implementation that bypasses UI-related methods for isolated business logic testing.

  • Constructor Details

    • MainPageAdapterTest

      public MainPageAdapterTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Initializes test environment before each test method:
      • Creates mock Context using Mockito
      • Prepares test MoodEvents with varied data states
      • Configures custom adapter with overridden methods:
        • Simplified getView() returning null to avoid view inflation
        • Direct data access methods using test collection

    • testAdapterCreation

      public void testAdapterCreation()
      Tests adapter initialization and basic configuration. Verifies:
      • Successful adapter instance creation
      • Correct item count matching test data size

    • testGetView

      public void testGetView()
      Tests the overridden getView() implementation. Validates that the method returns null as specified in the custom adapter configuration, indicating no view inflation is attempted during testing.

    • testGetItem

      public void testGetItem()
      Tests item retrieval functionality. Verifies:
      • Non-null return for valid positions
      • Correct data mapping for first test event
      • Proper field values in retrieved MoodEvent

    • testGetItemId

      public void testGetItemId()
      Tests item ID generation logic. Validates that position-based IDs match:
      • 0 for first position
      • 1 for second position

    • testGetContext

      public void testGetContext()
      Tests context retrieval override. Verifies the adapter returns the mock Context instance provided during setup.

    • testCount

      public void testCount()
      Tests item count reporting. Validates the adapter correctly reports:
      • Initial count matching test data size (2)
      • Consistent count after setup
